title: Daddy Farts Rainbows: Chrildren's Book About Farting. A Funny And Heartwarming Story About A Dad Who Farts Rainbows.
description: This new children's book by Brendan Davies is a fun story about a dad's special ability to fart rainbows. Little do him and his daughter know how helpful his rainbow farts will actuall be.
author: Brendan Davies
